title: Tournaments in NZ?
body: anyone know if there is ever LoL tournaments or anything similar in NZ ? or even any sites with info, had a quick look around but only found things from years back nothing active

replies.body:
https://www.facebook.com/OCETourney/

Currently starting to host Australia-wide tournaments if we get enough attention,

prizes supported by Riot but at the moment we're growing our playerbase, so if you could get your friends to join up, we could host tourneys!

Another super cool thing to do is look to join the university league of legends club that corresponds to the city you are in. 

I don't know much about the others, but I know that the Auckland university LoL club is open to everybody and includes weekly coaching sessions, weekly aram tournaments/ messing around in an internet cafe together, lots of opportunities to compete in tournaments, viewing parties, and so more. They also have some pretty awesome staff ;)
ah that does sound awesome, too bad ive checked out the vic uni page for wellington hasent had a post for months.. hopfully something will come up like this! {{summoner:12}}
Vic Uni this year has a dedicated eSports Association splitting away from Engineering group. FB page is up atm. If you want a place that does out of uni stuff then Skynet on Manners is your best bet

Hey there,

You could always take a look on the [OCE Events page](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/), there's always something going on somewhere, I'm sure there would eventually be a tournament being hosted in NZ.

Alternatively you could look into hosting your own and registering it through the events site linked above to get people involved :)
Thanks I will look into it :) !
